xml.brief: Retrieve all log entries for the specified geocache

desc.p: Retrieve all log entries for the specified geocache.

returns.p: Log entries. A dictionary of the following format:

ul.li: id - ID of the log entry,
date - date and time (ISO 8601) when the log entry was submitted,
user_id - ID of the user (who submitted the log entry),
username - name of the user (who submitted the log entry),

li.p: type - log type, one of: "found", "not_found" or "comment".
Notice: More types might be coming in the future. Your application should handle unknown log types as comments.

ul.li: comment - HTML string, text entered with the log entry.
